Articles.Content:
The handy separator, designed for "slicing the largest rockets in twain" appears on the face of it to have small issue with it's automatic fairing. It vanished mid mission. The vehicle still worked so the crew still made it home, but it does look slightly odd:

![wxVO3Uy.jpg](http://i.imgur.com/wxVO3Uy.jpg)

**DETAILS**

KSP V 1.02

Trying to do Apollo style. Was working with lander then switched vehicle in map, and hey presto.

[CRAFT FILE](https://www.dropbox.com/s/afq0e6m1nv862rz/Mullet%20Dyne%20Kerpollo.craft?dl=0) Yes Yes the lander doesn't have enough fuel to make it back to Mun orbit ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

The ouput\_log.txt or player.log file - I'd have to run the whole mission again to see if it was repeatable - no time.

A detailed list of system specifications:

Toshiba Notebook 17"

i7-3610QM @ 2.3 GHZ

16 GIG RAM

NVIDIA GeForce GT 630M

Loving 1.0(2) by the way, despite a couple of gremlins which are being stamped out ion a hurry. It's like starting from day 1 again ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-03T12:53:25Z" title="05/03/2015 12:53  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 3, 2015</time> by Speeding Mullet**
  
ion a hurry lol. Actually I'm leaving that one there.

That's actually the fairing for the heat shield and nothing to do with the separator, and as you found the separator will still function normally.

This is a new if minor graphical bug, the larger fairings can do this as well.

There's no fix as of this time.

> ...This is a new if minor graphical bug....

Thanks sal\_vager, I'm sure it will get picked up during future bug squashing ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)
